name: Learn Taiwanese Chinese Words
description: --- Fun and Relaxing Learning Experience ---  Look at the beautiful cards, listen to the native speakers voice and try to speak! Learn vocabulary effectively in an enjoyable way!   3 Learning modes: One-card Mode: Enjoy learning from the pretty pictures  Overview Mode: Quickly overview all the cards  Shuffle Mode: Help to memorize and examine your learning  --- Learn from 12 Languages Translated by Native Speakers --- English, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese (Mandarin), Cantonese, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Polish  Our international team loves promoting foreign languages and diverse cultures. We have 10-year experiences in teaching languages to foreigners and kids in the real life.   This app is adopting our teaching experience plus scientific methods to raise your interests and enable you to learn effectively. Voice from native speaker, accurate grammar.  --- FREE Contents ---  Play cards, get experience points, level up and collect new cards for free!  Lets learn like playing games!  More than 30 categories include:  Basic Conversations, Greetings  Numbers, Colors, Animals  Restaurant, Food, Vegetables, Fruits Sightseeing, Transportation, Shopping, Hotel (newly added) Body, Date, Family, Directions, Weather (newly added) Occupations, Hobbies and more (coming soon)  Are you planning to travel Taipei or other region in Taiwan? Do you want to learn some basic phrases, words and enjoy the conversation during the trip? Lets start it now!   Feedback: support.googleplay@lingo-apps.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LingoCards Web: http://www.lingo-apps.com
